project.name: Canteen Database API
project.description: Abstract mysqli library for use with the Canteen Framework.

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description:
Responsible for handing the authorization of a user
either through login, cookie or session. Located in the namespace __Canteen\Authorization__.

Privilege.name: Privilege
Privilege.description:
Reference for the different user privileges. 
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Authorization__.

AdminConfigController.name: AdminConfigController
AdminConfigController.description:
Handle the rendering of the admin config page.
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Controllers__.

AdminController.name: AdminController
AdminController.description:
For processing videos pages.
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Controllers__.

AdminObjectController.name: AdminObjectController
AdminObjectController.description:
Admin controller for standard object editing
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Controllers__.

params.name: formName
params.description: The full class name of the form

params.name: titleName
params.description: The name of the object field to use as select title

AdminPageController.name: AdminPageController
AdminPageController.description:
Controller to manage the page management form.
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Controllers__.

AdminPasswordController.name: AdminPasswordController
AdminPasswordController.description:
Controller for the password change page.
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Controllers__.

AdminUserController.name: AdminUserController
AdminUserController.description:
Controller to manage the user management form.
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Controllers__.

Controller.name: Controller
Controller.description:
Handle dynamic content and page requests. 
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Controllers__.

params.name: dynamicUri
params.description: The dynamic URI for which page.isDynamic is true

ForgotPasswordController.name: ForgotPasswordController
ForgotPasswordController.description:
The controller for the forgot password flow.
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Controllers__.

CanteenError.name: CanteenError
CanteenError.description:
Canteen errors are exceptions which are only visible
in debug mode. These are site critical things like
setup is wrong. Located in the namespace __Canteen\Errors__.

params.name: data
params.description: Any extra data associated with error

params.name: messages
params.description: The collection of messages to lookup

FileError.name: FileError
FileError.description:
Errors for saving to the file system.
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Errors__.

params.name: data
params.description: The optional data associated with this error

GatewayError.name: GatewayError
GatewayError.description:
Exceptions specific to the JSON server.  
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Errors__.

params.name: data
params.description: The optional data associated with this error

ObjectServiceError.name: ObjectServiceError
ObjectServiceError.description:
Exceptions specific to the ObjectService API.  
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Errors__.

params.name: data
params.description: The optional data associated with this error

UserError.name: UserError
UserError.description:
A user-facing error, such as a form, privilege or validation error.  
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Errors__.

params.name: data
params.description: The optional data associated with this error

params.name: type
params.description: The type of this event being dispatched

Config.name: Config
Config.description: Data class which represents a single config property.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services\Objects__.

DatabaseForm.name: DatabaseForm
DatabaseForm.description: Update the database to the latest version.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

ForgotPasswordForm.name: ForgotPasswordForm
ForgotPasswordForm.description:
Handling of the initial password forgot process Process for resetting password is:
  1. Request using username or email address a password reset
  2. Click on link in email
  3. Get temporary password
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

Form.name: Form
Form.description:
All forms inherit this class which allows for some error logging
as well ass access to the CanteenBase methods.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

FormFactory.name: FormFactory
FormFactory.description:
This handles the processing and message reporting for all the
site forms.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

InstallerForm.name: InstallerForm
InstallerForm.description: Update the database to the latest version.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

LoginForm.name: LoginForm
LoginForm.description: Form to login the user.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

ObjectForm.name: ObjectForm
ObjectForm.description: Generalized form for processing ObjectServiceItem objects

params.name: item
params.description: The reference to a valid service object

PageForm.name: PageForm
PageForm.description: Update or add a user.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

PasswordForm.name: PasswordForm
PasswordForm.description: Form for the user to handle their password update.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

SetupForm.name: SetupForm
SetupForm.description:
Handle the necessary database and deployment setup.
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

UserForm.name: UserForm
UserForm.description: Update or add a user.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Forms__.

PageBuilder.name: PageBuilder
PageBuilder.description:
Responsible for building the pages and handling page requests.
Located in the namespace __PageBuilder__.

DeploymentStatus.name: DeploymentStatus
DeploymentStatus.description:
Does a check on the server host to see what server
settings we should be using. Located in the namespace __Canteen\Server__.

params.name: settingsPath
params.description: The path to the settings PHP file or an Array

params.name: domain
params.description:
The domain to specific where we're coming from (optional)
		 checks the server constants if domain is not supplied

Gateway.name: Gateway
Gateway.description:
This server handles requests made through the gateway and returns JSON data.  
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Server__.

GatewayControl.name: GatewayControl
GatewayControl.description:
Gateway access control point. These are created internally by
the Gateway class and shouldn't be created directly.

ServerCache.name: ServerCache
ServerCache.description:
A server cache to reduce server load
this will try to use Memcache if available or fallback to a file-base approach.  
Located in the namespace __Canteen\Server__.

params.name: cacheDirectory
params.description: The folder to store the file-based cache

params.name: server
params.description: The IP of the memcache server we're connecting to

params.name: port
params.description: The port of the memcache server

params.name: expiresDefault
params.description: The default time before caches expire (defaults to 7 days)

Page.name: Page
Page.description: This is a generic data object that represents the page.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services\Objects__.

User.name: User
User.description: The user data object representing a single user.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services\Objects__.

ConfigService.name: ConfigService
ConfigService.description: Interacts with the config data table from the database. Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services__.

ObjectService.name: ObjectService
ObjectService.description:
Service provides basic methods for getting, updating, remove multiple objects 
on multiple tables.

ObjectServiceField.name: ObjectServiceField
ObjectServiceField.description:
A custom field is used by the ObjectService class
to represent property and db field definitions

params.name: id
params.description: The name of the database field

params.name: type
params.description: The validation type or set of items to match, default is no validation

ObjectServiceItem.name: ObjectServiceItem
ObjectServiceItem.description:
The encapsulation of a single data type, requires a predefined
data class and a table name and field definitions.

params.name: className
params.description: Class to bind database result to

params.name: table
params.description: The name of the database table

params.name: itemsName
params.description: The name of the plural items

PageService.name: PageService
PageService.description: Service for interacting with site pages in the database.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services__.

Service.name: Service
Service.description: All services should extends this base service class. Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services__.

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias to register service as

SimpleObjectService.name: SimpleObjectService
SimpleObjectService.description:
This is like the ObjectService but provides some convience methods if only
dealing with one object type. This include custom verify* methods for checking
different field types (e.g. `$this->verifyName($name)`). Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services__.

params.name: className
params.description: Class to bind database result to

params.name: table
params.description: The table that the objects are on

params.name: itemName
params.description:
The optional item name to specify, defaults to 
	unqalified class name (without the full namespace)

params.name: itemsName
params.description: The optional items name (plural) of itemName

TimeService.name: TimeService
TimeService.description: Service for getting the time off the server.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services__.

UserService.name: UserService
UserService.description: Services for accessing the Users and logging in to the site.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Services__.

CanteenBase.name: CanteenBase
CanteenBase.description: Common functionality for Services, Controllers, Forms. Located in the namespace __Canteen\Utilities__.

DateUtils.name: DateUtils
DateUtils.description: The collection of date related utilities

PasswordUtils.name: PasswordUtils
PasswordUtils.description: Utilities for managing the user password.  Located in the namespace __Canteen\Utilities__.

SettingsManager.name: SettingsManager
SettingsManager.description:
The settings manager keeps track of all Canteen settings and provides
protection and access control when doing page rendering. All important global
settings are registered here.

StringUtils.name: StringUtils
StringUtils.description: Simple utilities for formatting strings. Located in the namespace __Canteen\Utilities__.

Validate.name: Validate
Validate.description: Utilities to help sanitize data. Located in the namespace __Canteen\Utilities__.
